placeholders.specialInstructions: e.g., No onions, extra spicy, extra sauce on the side...

login.title: Tacobot Console
login.subtitle: Sign in with your Tacobot username to manage group orders.

hero.title: All eyes on tonight's French tacos run
hero.subtitle: Track active drop windows, submissions, and stock alerts in one crisp command center. Metrics refresh every time you pop back to the dashboard.

recentGroupOrders.title: Recent group orders
recentGroupOrders.description: Watch the heat levels on active and upcoming delivery cycles.
recentGroupOrders.emptyState: No group orders yet. Spin up a delivery window to get the crew ordering.

latestSubmissions.title: Latest submissions
latestSubmissions.description: The freshest orders the kitchen has received from your squad.

lowStockAlerts.title: Low stock alerts
lowStockAlerts.description: Keep ingredients topped up so every order lands with the perfect crunch.
lowStockAlerts.allInStock: All items are currently in stock. Keep the grill sizzling!

root.appSubtitle: Manage sizzling group orders, stock pulses, and rider timelines in one bright workspace.

hero.title: Coordinating deliveries, one sizzling wrap at a time
hero.subtitle: Launch limited-time drops, orchestrate kitchen prep, and keep riders synced. This surface gives you a pulse on every group order in the queue.

queue.title: Group order queue
queue.subtitle: Peek at every squad hungry for French tacos.
queue.empty: No group orders yet. Drop a new delivery window to kickstart a run.

form.title: Launch a delivery cycle
form.subtitle: Define a window, hype a name, and watch the crew pile in their tacos.

labels.deadlineHint: Orders must be submitted before this time

tip.title: Tip
tip.body: Hype the name. Bonus points if you tease the sauce lineup so riders know what’s melting tonight.

errors.datesRequired: Start and end date are required.
errors.endBeforeStart: End date must be after start date.

hero.title: Build your perfect taco
hero.subtitle: Craft your custom order with all your favorite ingredients

sizeSection.title: Choose your size
sizeSection.description: Select the perfect size for your taco

customizeSection.title: Customize your taco
customizeSection.subtitle: Select your meats, sauces, and garnishes

extrasSection.title: Add extras
extrasSection.subtitle: Complete your meal with sides and drinks

notes.title: Special instructions
notes.subtitle: Any special requests for the kitchen?

summary.title: Order summary
summary.subtitle: Review your selections
summary.emptyState: Select a taco size to see your order summary

validation.missingSelection: Select at least a taco or some extras/drinks/desserts.

errors.missingSelection: Please select at least a taco or some extras/drinks/desserts.
errors.missingFillings: If selecting a taco, please select at least one meat and sauce.
errors.garnishNotAvailable: Garnishes are not available for this taco size.
